content.text: Match ends, Borussia Mönchengladbach 2, FC Schalke 04 2.
Second Half ends, Borussia Mönchengladbach 2, FC Schalke 04 2.
Oscar Wendt (Borussia Mönchengladbach) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Foul by Oscar Wendt (Borussia Mönchengladbach).
Guido Burgstaller (FC Schalke 04) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt blocked. Mahmoud Dahoud (Borussia Mönchengladbach) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Jonas Hofmann.
Ralf Fährmann (FC Schalke 04) is shown the yellow card.
